char rpmQVKArguments_s::qva_mode

  • 'q' from --query, -q
  • 'Q' from --querytags
  • 'V' from --verify, -V
  • 'A' from --addsign
  • 'I' from --import
  • 'K' from --checksig, -K
  • 'R' from --resign
